attributes.action: Sack Stephen Byers from the Privy Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stephen Byers has not worked in the terms of the oath he gave when he became a Provy Councillor.  He should not be a member.
I dont understand how this is not in the gift of Mr Brown...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
